name: Lake Superior Hoodie - Navy
description:
Stay warm in a hoodie from our Lake Superior edition of the Signature Series. 

Lake Superior is the greatest lake on earth. The largest fresh water lake by surface area, and second largest by volume. Lake Superior never fails to leave us in awe. Whether it be massive waves or a rare day that's as smooth as glass, days spent along her shore are always cherished.

We're committed to making the finest quality Upper Peninsula t-shirts available. This Yooper Steez hoodie is printed on Independent Trading Company and are 55% Cotton / 45% polyester and 8.5 ounce fleece.

name: Tree Rings - Tan - Hoodie
description: Our latest design is a tribute to tree rings. As much as trees are at the heart of the Upper Peninsula, the Upper Peninsula is at the heart of a tree. We saw this recently with this Upper Peninsula tree stump. This shirt our own study in dendrochronology, the scientific method of dating trees by their rings. Yooper Steez hoodies are printed on Independent Trading Company and are 80% Cotton / 20% Polyester, 10.0 oz.

name: 906 Hoodie
description: Introducing the 906 Collection. Simple and classy, which is the epitome of style with ease. Just like our Signature Series of the Upper Peninsula silhouette those who aren't in the know will be asking what the 906 means. It's simplicity allows you to represent the Upper Peninsula in a new way. Each 906 shirt comes with a 3-pack of 906 stickers. Read more about Area Code 906 We're committed to making the finest quality Upper Peninsula t-shirts available. Yooper Steez hoodies are printed on Independent Trading Company and are 80% Cotton / 20% Polyester, 10.0 oz.

name: Lumberjack Jack Skateboard Deck
description:
Meet Lumberjack Jack.  He's the epitome of a Yooper.  He wears wool plaid shirts, he spends lots of time in the woods and he's got one mean looking beard.  Jack loves the Upper Peninsula as much as we do, from the forest to the Great Lakes.

Lumberjack Jack represents the Yooper in all of us.

All decks are seven-ply quality maple, coming from the same manufacturer as some of the major skateboard companies.

Two sizes are available:
7.5" wide by 31.5" long
8.0" wide by 31.75" long

Trucks and hardware sold separately.

name: Steez 1.0 Skateboard Deck
description:
Though Yooper Steez isn't a skateboard company, it's a company that's always been inspired by the skateboarding and snowboarding industries.  With skateboarding roots we thought a skateboard deck would be a fun expansion of products of our goal to provide unique, original, and quality Upper Peninsula related goods.

All decks are seven-ply quality maple, coming from the same manufacturer as some of the major skateboard companies.

Two sizes are available:
7.5" wide by 31.5" long
8.0" wide by 31.75" long

Trucks and hardware sold separately.

name: Mystery Tee
description:
Get a random Yooper Steez t-shirt for just 12 bucks! 

As our inventory gets updated with new colors and designs we build a stockpile of miscellaneous shirts we need to move out of the way. We'll always have some of these on hand to offer to you at a super low price, and once in a while, we might just throw in one of our newest styles.

*All sales are final with no returns or exchanges on Mystery Swag items. Duplicates may occur when ordering multiple.
